entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Guelph
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:52 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Guelph Turfgrass Institute 6:00 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
Temperature: 0.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 62 %
Dewpoint: -6.1°C
Wind: NNW 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2 with temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning early in the morning and ending near noon then 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 40 gusting to 70 near noon then diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 late in the afternoon. High plus 2 with temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. 60 percent chance of snow before morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
